title: Who can benefit from the CRM service?
paragraph: Our CRM service is designed for construction professionals, including general contractors, subcontractors, project managers, and construction firms. It helps manage client relationships, track interactions, and streamline communication to improve project outcomes.

title: What features does the CRM service offer?
paragraph: Our CRM service includes tools for centralizing client data, tracking interactions and project progress, automating follow-ups, and generating reports. It enhances team collaboration by providing a unified platform for sharing client information and updates.

title: Are there any additional fees?
paragraph: There are no hidden fees with our CRM service. The cost is included in your chosen pricing plan. Any additional charges, if applicable, will be clearly communicated in your plan details.

title: What plan and payment options are available?
paragraph: We offer a range of pricing plans tailored to different needs, with options for monthly or annual subscriptions. For detailed information on our plans and payment options, please visit our Pricing page.

title: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan at any time?
paragraph: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time based on your needs. Contact our support team to adjust your subscription as required.
